<ce:section-title>Synthesis of [HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(tmp)]<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>n</ce:italic>
</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">A methanol solution (10 ml) of tmp (19.8 mg, 0.1 mmol) was laid carefully above a THF solution (10 ml) of HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (45.4 mg, 0.1 mmol), yellow crystals (20% yield) suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained 3 days later. Found: C, 23.90; H, 2.10; N, 4.38. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">13</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>: C, 23.92; H, 2.17; N, 4.29%; IR (KBr pellet, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 2942.0(m), 1608.9(vs), 1426.6(s), 1221.5(sh), 1067.3(m), 1010.7(s), 813.7(s), 608.2(m), 514.8(s).</ce:para><ce:section-title>Synthesis of [HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(azobpy)]<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>n</ce:italic>
</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">A THF solution (10 ml) of 3,3'-azobipyridine (18.4 mg, 0.1 mmol) was dropwise added into a THF solution (10 ml) of HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (45.4 mg, 0.1 mmol), red crystals (23% yield) suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained 5 hrs later. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>HgI<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 18.75; H, 1.26; N, 8.75. Found: C, 18.26; H, 1.33; N, 8.90%. IR (KBr)/cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>: 3052(m), 2362(m), 1596(s), 1475(m), 1428(s), 1253(w), 1195(s), 1122(m), 1096(m), 1043(m), 1021(m), 967(m), 841(w), 820(s), 700(s), 636(s), 548(w), 528(m).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of [HgI2(tmp)] n  (1)

A methanol solution (10 ml) of tmp (19.8 mg, 0.1 mmol) was laid carefully above a THF solution (10 ml) of HgI2 (45.4 mg, 0.1 mmol), yellow crystals (20% yield) suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained 3 days later. Found: C, 23.90; H, 2.10; N, 4.38. Calc. for C13H14N2HgI2: C, 23.92; H, 2.17; N, 4.29%; IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 2942.0(m), 1608.9(vs), 1426.6(s), 1221.5(sh), 1067.3(m), 1010.7(s), 813.7(s), 608.2(m), 514.8(s).

Synthesis of [HgI2(azobpy)] n  (2)

A THF solution (10 ml) of 3,3'-azobipyridine (18.4 mg, 0.1 mmol) was dropwise added into a THF solution (10 ml) of HgI2 (45.4 mg, 0.1 mmol), red crystals (23% yield) suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained 5 hrs later. Anal. Calc. for C10H8HgI2N4: C, 18.75; H, 1.26; N, 8.75. Found: C, 18.26; H, 1.33; N, 8.90%. IR (KBr)/cm-1: 3052(m), 2362(m), 1596(s), 1475(m), 1428(s), 1253(w), 1195(s), 1122(m), 1096(m), 1043(m), 1021(m), 967(m), 841(w), 820(s), 700(s), 636(s), 548(w), 528(m).
